definition: deficiency/deficit/luckily/it's lucky that.../(often ironically) fancy that...
He who never wrongs others does not fear the knock in the night./Rest with a clear conscience.
pinyin: bu4 zuo4 kui1 xin1 shi4 , bu4 pa4 gui3 qiao1 men2
containing_words.word: 不做亏心事，不怕鬼敲门

definition: He who never wrongs others does not fear the knock in the night./Rest with a clear conscience.
pinyin: ping2 sheng1 bu4 zuo4 kui1 xin1 shi4 , ban4 ye4 qiao1 men2 xin1 bu4 jing1
containing_words.word: 平生不做亏心事，半夜敲门心不惊

sentences.english: He behaves as if he has something on his conscience.
sentences.chinese: 他的举动像是做了什么亏心事似的。

sentences.english: Professor Kwong School girls were hidden rules, exposure, according to a complaint bed Ungrateful men.
sentences.chinese: 广院女生遭传授潜规矩，曝光床照控告亏心男。

sentences.english: She behaves as if she has something on her conscience.
sentences.chinese: 她好像做了什么亏心事。

sentences.english: Don't do bad thing so do not afraid ghost.
sentences.chinese: 不做亏心事，不怕鬼叫门。

definition: to offend Heaven and reason (idiom); bloody atrocities that cry to heaven/outrageous acts
to be lacking in moral sense/to lack common basic respect for others/lacking in virtue/mischievous/wicked/cruel/mean
open and candid (idiom); straightforward and upright
to go to extremes/to leave no room for maneuver
The honest person does nothing underhand (idiom)./fig. Do what you want to do openly and without dissimulation.
pinyin: ming2 ren2 bu4 zuo4 an4 shi4

definition: to harm others without benefiting oneself (idiom)
to imitate the dog and steal chicken (idiom)/to pilfer/to dally with women/to have affairs
